entry.title: Get ready for The Angry Birds Movie 2 premiere with new in-game events!
entry.summary: The Angry Birds Movie 2 comes to US theaters tomorrow, but who wants to wait that long?! Good news: you can get into the movie mood right now with a new batch of Angry Birds Movie 2 events in your favorite Angry Birds games! Prime the hype engine with the trailer for The Angry Birds […]

entry.title: Angry Birds AR: Isle of Pigs is available now!
entry.summary: Classic Angry Birds gameplay + AR = an incredible amount of fun! Play Angry Birds AR: Isle of Pigs now on your ARKit enabled iOS device.
